minMovePermission.title: Minimum Move Permission
minMovePermission.hint: The minimum permission to allow users to move the screen with a ping. For example, if ASSISTANT is selected, only Gamemasters and their Assistants are allowed to perform a ping that moves everybodies' screens.

mouseButton.title: Mouse Button to Press for a Ping
mouseButton.hint: The mouse button that needs to be held for a specified time (configurable below) to perform a ping. 0 = left, 1 = middle, 2 = right. Press your desired mouse button (with modifiers like shift/ctrl if you want) in this field, use the escape key to clear it again.

mouseButtonMove.title: Mouse Button for a Screen-Moving Ping
mouseButtonMove.hint: The mouse button that needs to be held for a specified time (configurable below) to perform a ping that also moves all the player's screens to the ping. 0 = left, 1 = middle, 2 = right. Press your desired mouse button (with modifiers like shift/ctrl if you want) in this field, use the escape key to clear it again.

mouseButtonDuration.title: Mouse Button Press Duration
mouseButtonDuration.hint: The time in milliseconds you have to hold the mouse button until a ping is performed.

key.title: Key to Press for a Ping
key.hint: The key to press to perform a ping at the current location of the mouse cursor. Press your desired key (with modifiers like shift/ctrl if you want) in this field, use the escape key to clear it again.

keyMove.title: Key for a Screen-Moving Ping
keyMove.hint: The key to press to perform a ping at the current location of the mouse cursor that also moves all the player's screens to the ping. Press your desired key (with modifiers like shift/ctrl if you want) in this field, use the escape key to clear it again.

showName.title: Show Player Name
showName.hint: If the player name should be shown beneath the ping.

image.title: Ping Image
image.hint: The image that should be used as an alternative to the default ping. A tint will be applied based on the player's color, so everything other than greyscale will look bad.

scale.title: Scale
scale.hint: How big, in grids, the ping should be.

duration.title: Duration
duration.hint: How long the ping should be shown, in seconds.

rotate.title: Rotation
rotate.hint: If the ping image should rotate.

rotateSpeed.title: Rotation Speed
rotateSpeed.hint: How many seconds it should take for the ping image to rotate 360 degrees.

sizeChange.title: Size Change
sizeChange.hint: If the ping image should slightly change its size.

sizeChangeAmount.title: Size Change Amount
sizeChangeAmount.hint: How much of the total size should be changed.

sizeChangeSpeed.title: Size Change Speed
sizeChangeSpeed.hint: How long in seconds one cycle of size changing should take.
